pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tutorials for "R for Data Science" // When assigned "R for Data Science" (Wickham, etinkaya-Rundel, and Grolemund (2023, ISBN: 1492097402)), students should read the book and type in all the associated R commands themselves. Sadly, that never happens. These tutorials allow students to demonstrate (and their instructors to be sure) that all work has been completed. See Kane (2023) https://ppbds.github.io/tutorial.helpers/articles/i nstructions.html from the 'tutorial.helpers' package for a background discussion.
